ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Supratik Gupta has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 11 years. Currently he is employed as a .NET Developer at Mutual Hail Insurance Company of Iowa. Supratik has extensive knowledge of Microsoft .NET Technology, Microsoft ASP.NET, Microsoft C-SHARP, XML, Microsoft Silverlight - WPF/E, Windows Communiciation Foundation, Cascading Style Sheets, JavaScript, Windows Presentation Foundation, Microsoft Team Foundation Server, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, AJAX, ADO, Microsoft Internet Information Server, Web Services, Microsoft Visual Studio.NET, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Microsoft SQL Server, SQL, HTML, jQuery, Visual Basic .NET, SQL Server Integration Services, UML/OMT, Service Oriented Architecture, SQL Server Reporting Services, Object Oriented Analysis/Design, Microsoft Visual Studio, LINQ, XSL, WinForms, Stored Procedures, Seagate Crystal Reports, DHTML, XSLT, XHTML, XAML, Web Forms, VBScript, N-Tier, Microsoft Transact-SQL, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, MS Visual SourceSafe, Business Objects, XML Schema, WSDL, VSS, Scrum Methodology, SOAP, NUnit, MVVM, LAN/WAN > LAN, ETL, DAX, COM/DCOM, WWF, UDDI, Smart Client, Prism, Power Tools, Microsoft Visual C/C++, Microsoft Foundation Classes, Microsoft Dynamics AX, InterDev, ExpressionBlend 3.0, Active Template Library, AJAX Toolkit 3.0. So far Supratik has not gained any managerial experience.
